comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Addie Worth Bagley Daniels (1869-1943), daughter of Confederate Major William Henry Bagley and Adelaide Ann Worth Bagley. Her husband Josephus Daniels (1862-1948) was US Secretary of the Navy (1913-1921), and later Ambassador to Mexico (1933-1941). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Josephus_Daniels Her gravesite in Raleigh: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=20652303
